title: Rebuild entire website as React + TypeScript app to fix blank white screen

requirements.text: Rebuild the entire advocate website from scratch as a React + TypeScript single-page application using React Router for client-side routing. The current static HTML files in frontend/public are causing blank white screens in preview. Replace frontend/src/App.tsx with a fully functional React app that defines routes for '/' (Home), '/about', '/cases', '/appointment', and '/contact'. Ensure the app mounts correctly from frontend/src/main.tsx into the #root div in frontend/index.html (the Vite entry point). All five pages must render their full content using React components ‚Äî no blank screens.

quotes: Fix blank white screen issue immediately. Rebuild the project cleanly.
Ensure correct entry file: If React ‚Üí proper index.tsx or main.jsx rendering root App component.
Fix routing: Use proper router setup. Ensure default route "/" loads Home page.

acceptanceCriteria: The Vite/React app compiles without errors
Navigating to '/' renders the Home page with visible content
Navigating to '/about', '/cases', '/appointment', '/contact' each renders their respective page with visible content
No blank white screens appear in draft or live preview panes
The app mounts from main.tsx into #root in frontend/index.html
